price: 9. Paskui aš skelbiau jiems (viešai) ir (taip pat) pasakojau jiems privačiai,
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
